Instruction: Cut the cantaloupe into bite-sized cubes.
Slice each prosciutto slice in half lengthwise.
Thread a piece of cantaloupe, a folded slice of prosciutto, and a fresh basil leaf onto each skewer.
Repeat until all skewers are assembled.
Drizzle the skewers with balsamic glaze just before serving.
Serve chilled as a delightful side dish or appetizer.
